events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size.
The reported issue about the jacket not fitting has been categorized under 'Refund' due to the customer's request for a refund or exchange.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Samantha to assist with the refund and exchange request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund or exchange for the jacket that doesn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if you would prefer a refund or an exchange for a different size?
My order number is 87654321. I think I would prefer to exchange it for a size medium instead of the large I originally ordered.
Thank you for the info! We can process an exchange for the medium size jacket right away. I will send you a prepaid shipping label to return the current jacket.
Thanks for the quick reply! I appreciate the prepaid label and look forward to receiving the medium size soon.
The exchange request has been processed and the shipping label sent. Your exchange should arrive within 7-10 business days.
Just checking in to see if you received the medium jacket and if everything is satisfactory with your exchange.
Yes, I got the new jacket yesterday and it fits perfectly. Thank you so much for your help!
Glad to hear that the jacket fits well now! We are closing this case but feel free to contact us again anytime.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our services.
